import React from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import style from '../Stlyes/Cart.module.scss' import { decrementQuantity, incrementQuantity, removeItem } from "../store/CartSlice"; export default function Cart() { const {cart}=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch() const getTotal = ()=>{ let totalQuantity = 0; let totalPrice = 0; cart.forEach(item => { totalQuantity+= item.quantity; totalPrice+= item.price * item.quantity }); return {totalPrice, totalQuantity } } return ( <>

Shopping Cart

# Product Price Quantity
#1
{item.title}
{item.price}$
 {" "}
dispatch(decrementQuantity(item.id))}> - dispatch(incrementQuantity(item.id))}> +
dispatch(removeItem(item.id))} >
); }
